hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select periodly_sum.PERIODLY_ID periodlyId, player_profile.USER_ID userId, periodly_sum.NUMBER number, periodly_sum.TITLE title, DATE_FORMAT(periodly_sum.START_DATE, "%Y年%m月%d日") startDate, DATE_FORMAT(periodly_sum.END_DATE, "%Y年%m月%d日") endDate, periodly_sum.WIN_TIMES winTimes, periodly_sum.WIN_SCORES winScores, periodly_sum.LOSE_TIMES loseTimes, periodly_sum.LOSE_SCORES loseScores, periodly_sum.DRAW_TIMES drawTimes, periodly_sum.DRAW_SCORES drawScores, periodly_sum.TOTAL_TIMES totalTimes, periodly_sum.TOTAL_SCORES totalScores, periodly_sum.TOTAL_SYSTEM_SCORE totalSystemScore, periodly_sum.STATUS status, periodly_sum.CREATE_TIME createTime, periodly_sum.CREATE_BY createBy, periodly_sum.UPDATE_TIME updateTime, periodly_sum.UPDATE_BY updateBy from periodly_sum left outer join player_profile on periodly_sum.PROFILE_ID = player_profile.PROFILE_ID WHERE periodly_sum.START_DATE = ? AND periodly_sum.END_DATE = ? AND (UPPER(PLAYER_PROFILE.USER_ID) LIKE UPPER(?)) AND (? is null or player_profile.rls_path like ?) ORDER BY player_profile.USER_ID

INSERT INTO PERIODLY_SUM( PERIODLY_ID, TITLE, PROFILE_ID, TOTAL_TIMES, TOTAL_SCORES, WIN_TIMES, WIN_SCORES, LOSE_TIMES, LOSE_SCORES, DRAW_TIMES, DRAW_SCORES, TOTAL_SYSTEM_SCORE, START_DATE, END_DATE, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, UPDATE_BY ) SELECT UUID(), concat('积分统计(', concat(DATE_FORMAT(?, "%Y年%m月%d日"), concat('至', concat(DATE_FORMAT(?, "%Y年%m月%d日") ,')') ) ) ), PLAYER_PROFILE.PROFILE_ID, CASE WHEN TOTAL_SUM.TIMES IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE TOTAL_SUM.TIMES END totalTimes, CASE WHEN TOTAL_SUM.SCORES IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE TOTAL_SUM.SCORES END totalScores, CASE WHEN WIN_SUM.TIMES IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE WIN_SUM.TIMES END winTimes, CASE WHEN WIN_SUM.SCORES IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE WIN_SUM.SCORES END winScores, CASE WHEN LOSE_SUM.TIMES IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE LOSE_SUM.TIMES END loseTimes, CASE WHEN LOSE_SUM.SCORES IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE LOSE_SUM.SCORES END loseScores, CASE WHEN DRAW_SUM.TIMES IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE DRAW_SUM.TIMES END drawTimes, CASE WHEN DRAW_SUM.SCORES IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE DRAW_SUM.SCORES END drawScores, CASE WHEN TOTAL_SUM.SYS_SCORE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE TOTAL_SUM.SYS_SCORE END totalSystemScore, ? startDate, ? endDate, CURRENT_DATE, CURRENT_DATE, 'SYSTEM', 'SYSTEM' FROM PLAYER_PROFILE LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT PROFILE_ID, COUNT(CUR_SCORE) TIMES, SUM(CUR_SCORE) SCORES, SUM(SYS_SCORE) SYS_SCORE FROM PLAYER_SCORE WHERE PLAYER_SCORE.CREATE_TIME BETWEEN ? AND DATE_ADD(?, INTERVAL 1 DAY) GROUP BY PROFILE_ID ) TOTAL_SUM ON PLAYER_PROFILE.PROFILE_ID = TOTAL_SUM.PROFILE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT PROFILE_ID, COUNT(CUR_SCORE) TIMES, SUM(CUR_SCORE) SCORES FROM PLAYER_SCORE WHERE CUR_SCORE > 0 AND PLAYER_SCORE.CREATE_TIME BETWEEN ? AND DATE_ADD(?, INTERVAL 1 DAY) GROUP BY PROFILE_ID ) WIN_SUM ON PLAYER_PROFILE.PROFILE_ID = WIN_SUM.PROFILE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT PROFILE_ID, COUNT(CUR_SCORE) TIMES, SUM(CUR_SCORE) SCORES FROM PLAYER_SCORE WHERE CUR_SCORE < 0 AND PLAYER_SCORE.CREATE_TIME BETWEEN ? AND DATE_ADD(?, INTERVAL 1 DAY) GROUP BY PROFILE_ID ) LOSE_SUM ON PLAYER_PROFILE.PROFILE_ID = LOSE_SUM.PROFILE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT PROFILE_ID, COUNT(CUR_SCORE) TIMES, SUM(CUR_SCORE) SCORES FROM PLAYER_SCORE WHERE CUR_SCORE = 0 AND PLAYER_SCORE.CREATE_TIME BETWEEN ? AND DATE_ADD(?, INTERVAL 1 DAY) GROUP BY PROFILE_ID ) DRAW_SUM ON PLAYER_PROFILE.PROFILE_ID = DRAW_SUM.PROFILE_ID WHERE (UPPER(PLAYER_PROFILE.USER_ID) LIKE UPPER(?)) AND (? is null or player_profile.rls_path like ?)

SELECT PLAYER_PROFILE.PROFILE_ID profileId, current_date ||'积分统计' title, CASE WHEN TOTAL_SUM.TIMES IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE TOTAL_SUM.TIMES END totalTimes, CASE WHEN TOTAL_SUM.SCORES IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE TOTAL_SUM.SCORES END totalScores, CASE WHEN WIN_SUM.TIMES IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE WIN_SUM.TIMES END winTimes, CASE WHEN WIN_SUM.SCORES IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE WIN_SUM.SCORES END winScores, CASE WHEN LOSE_SUM.TIMES IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE LOSE_SUM.TIMES END loseTimes, CASE WHEN LOSE_SUM.SCORES IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE LOSE_SUM.SCORES END loseScores, CASE WHEN DRAW_SUM.TIMES IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE DRAW_SUM.TIMES END drawTimes, CASE WHEN DRAW_SUM.SCORES IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE DRAW_SUM.SCORES END drawScores, CASE WHEN TOTAL_SUM.SYS_SCORE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE TOTAL_SUM.SYS_SCORE END totalSystemScore, ? startDate, ? endDate FROM PLAYER_PROFILE LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT PROFILE_ID, COUNT(SCORE) TIMES, SUM(SCORE) SCORES, SUM(SYSTEM_SCORE) SYS_SCORE FROM PLAYER_SCORE WHERE PLAYER_SCORE.CREATE_TIME BETWEEN ? AND DATE_ADD(?, INTERVAL 1 DAY) GROUP BY PROFILE_ID ) TOTAL_SUM ON PLAYER_PROFILE.PROFILE_ID = TOTAL_SUM.PROFILE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT PROFILE_ID, COUNT(SCORE) TIMES, SUM(SCORE) SCORES FROM PLAYER_SCORE WHERE SCORE > 0 AND PLAYER_SCORE.CREATE_TIME BETWEEN ? AND DATE_ADD(?, INTERVAL 1 DAY) GROUP BY PROFILE_ID ) WIN_SUM ON PLAYER_PROFILE.PROFILE_ID = WIN_SUM.PROFILE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT PROFILE_ID, COUNT(SCORE) TIMES, SUM(SCORE) SCORES FROM PLAYER_SCORE WHERE SCORE < 0 AND PLAYER_SCORE.CREATE_TIME BETWEEN ? AND DATE_ADD(?, INTERVAL 1 DAY) GROUP BY PROFILE_ID ) LOSE_SUM ON PLAYER_PROFILE.PROFILE_ID = LOSE_SUM.PROFILE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT PROFILE_ID, COUNT(SCORE) TIMES, SUM(SCORE) SCORES FROM PLAYER_SCORE WHERE SCORE = 0 AND PLAYER_SCORE.CREATE_TIME BETWEEN ? AND DATE_ADD(?, INTERVAL 1 DAY) GROUP BY PROFILE_ID ) DRAW_SUM ON PLAYER_PROFILE.PROFILE_ID = DRAW_SUM.PROFILE_ID WHERE (UPPER(PLAYER_PROFILE.USER_ID) LIKE UPPER(?))

AND DATE_ADD(?, INTERVAL 1 DAY) GROUP BY PROFILE_ID ) LOSE_SUM ON PLAYER_PROFILE.PROFILE_ID = LOSE_SUM.PROFILE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT PROFILE_ID, COUNT(SCORE) TIMES, SUM(SCORE) SCORES FROM PLAYER_SCORE WHERE SCORE = 0 AND PLAYER_SCORE.CREATE_TIME BETWEEN ? AND DATE_ADD(?, INTERVAL 1 DAY) GROUP BY PROFILE_ID ) DRAW_SUM ON PLAYER_PROFILE.PROFILE_ID = DRAW_SUM.PROFILE_ID WHERE (UPPER(PLAYER_PROFILE.USER_ID) LIKE UPPER(?))

INSERT INTO PERIODLY_SUM_EXT( PERIODLY_ID, TITLE, PROFILE_ID, TOTAL_TIMES, TOTAL_SCORES, WIN_TIMES, WIN_SCORES, LOSE_TIMES, LOSE_SCORES, DRAW_TIMES, DRAW_SCORES, TOTAL_SYSTEM_SCORE, START_DATE, END_DATE, CURRENT_SCORE, PLAYER_LIMIT_SCORE, RECHARGE_SUM, RESULT_SCORE, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, UPDATE_BY ) SELECT UUID(), concat('积分统计(', concat(DATE_FORMAT(?, "%Y年%m月%d日"), concat('至', concat(DATE_FORMAT(?, "%Y年%m月%d日") ,')') ) ) ), PLAYER_PROFILE.PROFILE_ID, CASE WHEN TOTAL_SUM.TIMES IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE TOTAL_SUM.TIMES END totalTimes, CASE WHEN TOTAL_SUM.SCORES IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE TOTAL_SUM.SCORES END totalScores, CASE WHEN WIN_SUM.TIMES IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE WIN_SUM.TIMES END winTimes, CASE WHEN WIN_SUM.SCORES IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE WIN_SUM.SCORES END winScores, CASE WHEN LOSE_SUM.TIMES IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE LOSE_SUM.TIMES END loseTimes, CASE WHEN LOSE_SUM.SCORES IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE LOSE_SUM.SCORES END loseScores, CASE WHEN DRAW_SUM.TIMES IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE DRAW_SUM.TIMES END drawTimes, CASE WHEN DRAW_SUM.SCORES IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE DRAW_SUM.SCORES END drawScores, CASE WHEN TOTAL_SUM.SYS_SCORE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE TOTAL_SUM.SYS_SCORE END totalSystemScore, ? startDate, ? endDate, PLAYER_PROFILE.CURRENT_SCORE currentScore, PLAYER_PROFILE.INIT_LIMIT initScore, CASE WHEN RECHARGE_SCORE.SCORE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE RECHARGE_SCORE.SCORE END rechargeScore, (PLAYER_PROFILE.CURRENT_SCORE - PLAYER_PROFILE.INIT_LIMIT - (CASE WHEN RECHARGE_SCORE.SCORE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE RECHARGE_SCORE.SCORE END)) resultScore, CURRENT_DATE, CURRENT_DATE, 'SYSTEM', 'SYSTEM' FROM PLAYER_PROFILE LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT PROFILE_ID, COUNT(CUR_SCORE) TIMES, SUM(CUR_SCORE) SCORES, SUM(SYS_SCORE) SYS_SCORE FROM PLAYER_SCORE WHERE PLAYER_SCORE.CREATE_TIME BETWEEN ? AND DATE_ADD(?, INTERVAL 1 DAY) GROUP BY PROFILE_ID ) TOTAL_SUM ON PLAYER_PROFILE.PROFILE_ID = TOTAL_SUM.PROFILE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT PROFILE_ID, COUNT(CUR_SCORE) TIMES, SUM(CUR_SCORE) SCORES FROM PLAYER_SCORE WHERE CUR_SCORE > 0 AND PLAYER_SCORE.CREATE_TIME BETWEEN ? AND DATE_ADD(?, INTERVAL 1 DAY) GROUP BY PROFILE_ID ) WIN_SUM ON PLAYER_PROFILE.PROFILE_ID = WIN_SUM.PROFILE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT PROFILE_ID, COUNT(CUR_SCORE) TIMES, SUM(CUR_SCORE) SCORES FROM PLAYER_SCORE WHERE CUR_SCORE < 0 AND PLAYER_SCORE.CREATE_TIME BETWEEN ? AND DATE_ADD(?, INTERVAL 1 DAY) GROUP BY PROFILE_ID ) LOSE_SUM ON PLAYER_PROFILE.PROFILE_ID = LOSE_SUM.PROFILE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT PROFILE_ID, COUNT(CUR_SCORE) TIMES, SUM(CUR_SCORE) SCORES FROM PLAYER_SCORE WHERE CUR_SCORE = 0 AND PLAYER_SCORE.CREATE_TIME BETWEEN ? AND DATE_ADD(?, INTERVAL 1 DAY) GROUP BY PROFILE_ID ) DRAW_SUM ON PLAYER_PROFILE.PROFILE_ID = DRAW_SUM.PROFILE_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT RECHARGE_RECORD.TO_PLAYER, SUM(SCORE) SCORE FROM RECHARGE_RECORD WHERE RECHARGE_RECORD. CREATE_TIME BETWEEN ? AND DATE_ADD(?, INTERVAL 1 DAY) GROUP BY RECHARGE_RECORD.TO_PLAYER ) RECHARGE_SCORE ON RECHARGE_SCORE.TO_PLAYER = PLAYER_PROFILE.USER_ID WHERE PLAYER_PROFILE.PROFILE_ID IN (:USERLIST)

SELECT 1 AS ID, COUNT(*) PC_COUNT FROM PLAYER_SCORE PC WHERE PC.CREATE_TIME BETWEEN ? AND DATE_ADD(?, INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND PC.PROFILE_ID IN (:USERLIST) UNION SELECT 2 AS ID, COUNT(*) PS_COUNT FROM PLAYER_SCORE PS WHERE PS.PROFILE_ID IN (:USERLIST) UNION SELECT 3 AS ID, COUNT(*) RC_COUNT FROM RECHARGE_RECORD RC INNER JOIN PLAYER_PROFILE PP ON RC.TO_PLAYER = PP.USER_ID WHERE RC.CREATE_TIME BETWEEN ? AND DATE_ADD(?, INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND PP.PROFILE_ID IN (:USERLIST) UNION SELECT 4 AS ID, COUNT(*) RS_COUNT FROM RECHARGE_RECORD RS INNER JOIN PLAYER_PROFILE PPP ON RS.TO_PLAYER = PPP.USER_ID WHERE PPP.PROFILE_ID IN (:USERLIST)
select profile_id from player_profile where (role ='GroupUser' or role = 'User') and (replace(rls_path, concat("!", user_id), "") = ? or ? = 'null') order by rls_path
